name: Phish Upon a Star v0.2
description:
You are sitting upon a bench overlooking a city at night. Probably the city you live in.

You hum a tune to yourself and notice three UFOs rudely interrupt the subdued city scene. They begin to line up an attack run on the poor people trying to sleep in their homes below. Fortunately, you are a world-class phishing hacktivist. You whip out your laptop and begin dialing in your counter-attack.

INSTRUCTIONS

1. After beginning a wave the first thing you must do is press spacebar when the reticule is over the spaceship.

2. Now the phishing begins, you must select the most viable phishing email based on the aliens' profile.

- Keep the city status from crumbling.

- Enjoy!

This was hastily uploaded for the sake of the jam. I plan to include in-game instructions and a more engaging UFO clicking phase.
